CustomField.formula:
If ( (Project_Name__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Parking_Garage'), ECCA__c / Project_Name__r.Parking_Garage_Gross_Area_SF__c,IF( TEXT(Project_Name__r.Project_type__c)== 'Repair & Alteration - Work Item Detail', RA_ECCA__c /Project_Name__r.Total_GSF__c ,ECCA__c / Project_Name__r.Total_GSF__c )
)
CustomField.label: ECCA/GSF
